item.description:
Currier Museum of Art Grand Reopening - Explore the newly expanded Currier Museum of Art for free!

Agenda:

11am - Ribbon cutting ceremony with Governor and Dr. Lynch and Mayor Guinta
11:30am - Art-making activity in the classrooms
11:30am - Zimmerman House Highlight Tour *
12pm - Currier float in Manchester's St. Patrick's Day parade
12:30pm - Monadnock Children's Choir
1:30pm - Zimmerman House Highlight Tour
2pm - Manchester Chorale Society
3pm - Family storyteller Odds Bodkin
4:30pm - Art-making activity in the classrooms
7:30pm - Latin Rock band deSoL


*Zimmerman House Tours Reopens:
Take a tour of the only Frank Lloyd Wright-designed building in New England open to the public! For the first week the museum is open (March 30 - April 5), docents will escort visitors to the Frank Lloyd Wright-designed Zimmerman House for first-come, first-serve highlights tours at 11:30am and 1:30pm daily.

After the ribbon cutting ceremonies I would like to tour the Zimmerman House first. Then come back to the Art Museum for the other events.
item.how_to_find_us: I will be in front of the Currier Museum. Wearing a MEET-UP Badge.
item.name: Currier Museum of Art - Grand Opening
